    1: import numpy as np
    2: import pytest
    3: 
    4: from pandas import (
    5:     PeriodIndex,
    6:     period_range,
    7: )
    8: import pandas._testing as tm
    9: 
   10: 
   11: class TestRepeat:
   12:     @pytest.mark.parametrize("use_numpy", [True, False])
   13:     @pytest.mark.parametrize(
   14:         "index",
   15:         [
   16:             period_range("2000-01-01", periods=3, freq="D"),
   17:             period_range("2001-01-01", periods=3, freq="2D"),
   18:             PeriodIndex(["2001-01", "NaT", "2003-01"], freq="M"),
   19:         ],
   20:     )
   21:     def test_repeat_freqstr(self, index, use_numpy):
   22:         # GH#10183
   23:         expected = PeriodIndex([per for per in index for _ in range(3)])
   24:         result = np.repeat(index, 3) if use_numpy else index.repeat(3)
   25:         tm.assert_index_equal(result, expected)
   26:         assert result.freqstr == index.freqstr
